
mimir cli
=========


.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/mimir-cli.svg
   :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/mimir-cli
   :alt: PyPI version


Access Mimir platform from the cli

Installation
============

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install mimir-cli

Usage
=====

To use it:

.. code-block::

   $ mimir --help
